answers.answer: Hello.There is no strong evidence of Xanax producing night sweats.Some common causes are ... Diabetes and Obstructive Sleep apnea (with disturbed sleep and feelings of fatigue). You need to rule out these. Hyperthyroidism is also known to cause night sweats.I would suggest you consult your physician and get these reasons ruled.Regards

question: Are night sweat and gross fatigue due to the use of Xanax/Alprazola over a 36 year period?
title: night sweat & xanax
